name: Soccer Juggle
description:
Soccer Juggle is a game where you have to juggle the ball as long as you can.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Start Game:  Press Spacekey/Tap Touch Display

Play: Press on the ball (Mouse)/Press on the Ball (Touch display)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What the game still needs:

-Menu screen

-Game over screen

- Saving scores

-Polishing
